A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a stirring homage and character progression of our original favorite Jedi\, Luke Skywalker\, with many surprises along the way for the old characters and the new!  It's a truly emotional  journey with stunning battle scenes as well!  As a fan since the 80s\, I was enthralled and transported to my childhood while also enjoying the chance to see Luke and Leia's growth as characters.  Newcomer Kelly Marie Tran was a wonderful addition to the cast and Adam Driver's acting was phenomenal.  This easily rivals Empire Strikes Back for drama\, thrills\, and shocking developments!
